caption_text:
IT’S TIME TO STEP INTO THE LOOKING GLASS ✨ Welcome to WONDERLAND ✨ Where queer magic is the motivation and the groove is golden 🌈⭐️🪩🪄✨

Find your spot out on the floor and get lost in music with our shining lineup of DJs:

💫 DELICIOUS @deliciousdj_: the mind behind TRANSlation and Bodiesx3, blessing our stage from Toronto with sounds to make your bodies MOVE.

💫 DIVAA @existentialcowgirl: the Mother of OBGD and the House Of DIVAA, known for making the room shake with that big disco energy.

💫 SLAMBOXXX @i.am.slamoiselle: A hard-hitting part of the legendary roster of @fierceguelph here to join in a new wave of queer dancefloor power.

💫 DANASONIC @danasonic_: a familiar face around here, with a muscle for blending the experimental with the classic and sending us off with a bang.

Get ready to raise your fans and fives for our luxurious lineup of drag performers:

👑 @kween.karamelle ✨ 
👑 @mr_dallas_ryder ✨
👑 @annetiquedoll ✨
👑 @exclusivelyzi ✨

+ gogo dancing from @thepkism 

Hosted by Mary Poppers @existentialcowgirl and @alexhannides, in partnership with @kwgaysandtheys 

COME EXPERIENCE THE WONDER OF ONE BIG GAY DISCO, STUDIO 54 STYLE 🌈⭐️🪩🪄✨

ADVANCE TIX: $17 (includes Eventbrite fees)

VENUE: @thehub_kw (2nd floor venue with stairs; if assistance is needed, please let us know, and we will accomodate the best we can)

*A portion of ticket sales will be donated directly to @thrivehiv, a vital local resource that helps connect our community to life-changing resources and supports those living with HIV*

Poster design by @existentialcowgirl 

(Archival Studio 54 photos belong to Getty Images)
